title: Traditional bakewell tart
ingredients: ['100g (4 oz) of shortcrust pastry', '2 tablespoons strawberry or raspberry jam', '60g (2 oz) butter', '60g (2 oz) caster sugar', '1 egg', '1/4 tsp lemon zest', '3 tablespoons plain flour', '115g (4 oz) ground almonds', '1/4 tsp baking powder', '1 tablespoon of flaked almonds (optional)', 'Icing sugar (for dusting)']
